properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
CYPRUS.
CRETE.
DNC 09, DNC 10.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 03 APR BY
   M/V MARIA S. MERIAN:
   A. IN AREA BOUND BY
      34-16.0N 030-00.0E, 34-10.0N 034-00.0E,
      33-54.0N 034-00.0E, 34-00.0N 030-00.0E.
   B. IN AREA BOUND BY
      34-31.4N 026-04.5E, 34-07.1N 032-22.6E,
      33-53.3N 032-22.4E, 34-17.5N 026-04.3E.
   C. IN VICINITY OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      35-18.0N 026-39.0E, 35-40.2N 026-16.8E,
      35-07.8N 026-22.8E, 34-17.8N 025-56.3E,
      34-14.0N 024-33.0E, 35-02.4N 023-12.0E,
      35-39.0N 023-19.8E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 APR 18.
